description: Detects different hacktools used for relay attacks on Windows for privilege escalation
author: Florian Roth
false_positives: Legitimate files with these rare hacktool names
name: SMB Relay Attack Tools
query: (((process.executable.text:(*PetitPotam* OR *RottenPotato* OR *HotPotato* OR *JuicyPotato* OR *\\just_dce_* OR *Juicy\ Potato* OR *\\temp\\rot.exe* OR *\\Potato.exe* OR *\\SpoolSample.exe* OR *\\Responder.exe* OR *\\smbrelayx* OR *\\ntlmrelayx* OR *\\LocalPotato*)) OR (process.command_line.text:(*Invoke\-Tater* OR *\ smbrelay* OR *\ ntlmrelay* OR *cme\ smb\ * OR *\ \/ntlm\:NTLMhash\ * OR *Invoke\-PetitPotam* OR *.exe\ \-t\ \*\ \-p\ *)) OR ((process.command_line.text:*.exe\ \-c\ \"\{* AND process.command_line.text:*\}\"\ \-z))) AND (NOT process.executable.text:(*HotPotatoes6* OR *HotPotatoes7* OR *HotPotatoes\ *)))
